data.name: Grow The Hell Up by Dusty Lane
data.detailed_description:
Currently in development, Grow The Hell Up by Dusty Lane is an absurd adventure VR game. Solve unique physics puzzles, decipher codes, find hidden items... and try your best to act like an adult...


You're an adult now!


While celebrating your 21st birthday at the bar, you meet the love of your life. But you party way too hard and when you wake up the next day you discover that you lost her phone number. Now you'll do anything to find her again. Someone will know how to find her, right?


- Talk to strangers. Make some friends. Do some favors.
- Complete quests and solve puzzles that cross over 8 different levels.
- Relax and play some mini games.
- Take out your frustration on unkind people.


Features:
- Hand and head collision with the environment.
- Physics-based interactions.
- Destructible objects.
- Smart-ass AI.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages: Explicit language, sexual and adult themes, violence and gore, drug and alcohol abuse.
